entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:24 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 05:36 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.0°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
